ratings.comment: I took Rob's first Dutch class in 1984. His immersion style and infectious energy will have you speaking German or Dutch before you know it. I have no doubt his scholarship and teaching have greatly enriched UW and his lucky students since then. A 5-point index doesn't capture his energy, intellect, and affable demeanor. Crank it up to11. Bedankt!

Rob is an absolutely phenomenal professor. He cares more for his students' success than any other professor whom I have encountered in both my undergraduate and graduate careers. He even attempts to adapt his lectures to include the interests of the students in the room. I would highly recommend anybody to take a course with him before he retires.

The greatest professor I have ever had and ever will have. He truly cares about his students and makes every class fun and interesting, and he can answer any question you have about what seems like any language. Take every class you possibly can with him.
best teacher!!!!!!!!!!!
Very knowledgable in Old Germanic languages.

Well, this was the best course ever.  Prof. Howell was so easy to talk to and clearly really cared about how things were going for us.  I got something interesting out of every class period.  Tough exams, but absolutely fair.  Expectations were very clear.
My favorite course at UW so far.  Professor Howell is really interesting, and he cares about us as students and people.
This class led me to completely redefine my career interests and goals.  Professor Howell is an amazing lecturer, and I was constantly astonished by what his class revealed about German and English.

Professor Howell inspires his students, and he really cares about us. Like others have said.  He is the kind of professor whose class is so interesting and compelling, you get yourself to go no matter what.  Not easy, but so fair.  I miss having him in my week.

I had Professor Howell in 2001.  He is still an inspiration to me.  Not only a great teacher, he cares about his students.  He remembered me in 2005 and provided a letter of recommendation (I got the job!).
Great course, great prof
Great teacher, great advisor.  Take whatever he teaches.
Prof. Howell is a fantastic teacher, the best I've had.  He also helped me a lot my senior year with advice about grad school and life after college.  Busy guy,but always had time for me.
Available all the time, very helpful.
Difficult material, but he stuck with it an let me learn, review sessions useful, always ready to help out.  Excellent instructor!
let's have more profs like this
very interesting
most helpful prof possible
Excellent teacher who is very passionate about his material.  Definitely a must-take!
Excellent course
Great!
No Comments
No Comments
No Comments
